meanings: (관점) angle, view, perspective, point of view, viewpoint, standpoint

vlive.korean: 이 각도도 괜찮나요? Do you like this angle as well? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 😁 Happy DK & Vernon Day 🤟
vlive.english: Do you like this angle as well?

vlive.korean: [신기] 여러 각도가 있어? [Interesting] From another angle? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
이렇게 - 각도의 중요성! Like this. - The importance of angles! 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
vlive.english: Like this. - The importance of angles!

vlive.korean: 그래도... - 이 각도 어때요? Still... - How do you like this angle? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 😁 Happy DK & Vernon Day 🤟
vlive.english: Still... - How do you like this angle?

vlive.korean: 그래서... - 여러 가지 각도마다 돌릴 때마다... So... - Depending on the angle. 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'

examples.korean: You can look at the issue from many different angles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사안을 많은 다른 각도에서 살펴볼 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can look at the issue from many different angles. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’re getting nowhere—let’s come at it from another angle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 아무런 진전을 못 보고 있어요. 다른 각도에서 그것에 접근해 봅시다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re getting nowhere—let’s come at it from another angle. Add to Wordbook
